assignments.description: Assigns the logged in user as the Current User.
assignments.name: Assign_Logged_in_User_to_Current_User_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Logged in User to Current User Variable

assignments.description: Assigns the selected user to the Current User variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Selected_User_to_Current_User_Variable
assignments.label: Assign Selected User to Current User Variable

assignments.description: Counts the number of location records from the get record.
assignments.name: Count_Location_Records
assignments.label: Count Location Records

choices.description: Choose to close an existing till.
choices.name: CloseaTill

choices.description: Choose to open a new till
choices.name: OpenaNewTill

decisions.description: Checks to see if the org has one or multiple location records.
decisions.name: Check_Number_of_Locations
decisions.label: Check Number of Locations

decisions.description: Checks to see if the current user has an open till shift or not.
decisions.name: Does_User_Have_Opened_Till
decisions.label: Does User Have Opened Till

decisions.description: Checks to see if the user wants to close their open tills
decisions.name: Does_User_want_to_Close_Their_Open_Tills
decisions.label: Does User want to Close Their Open Tills

decisions.description: Checks to see if the user chose to open or close a till from the last screen.
decisions.name: Is_User_Opening_or_Closing_a_Till
decisions.label: Is User Opening or Closing a Till

decisions.description: Checks to see if the user accessing this flow is a till user. If not, show them a list of all till users so they can select their own.
decisions.name: Is_User_Till_User
decisions.label: Is User Till User

rules.name: Current_user_is_not_a_till_user
rules.label: Current user is not a till user

decisions.description: Checks to see if any users records where Till User = True exist.
decisions.name: Were_Till_Users_Found
decisions.label: Were Till Users Found

Flow.description: Screen flow used to start a shift for the Till Management process.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Displays the POS Terminals based on the chosen location.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: POSTerminalPicklistChoices

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Shows the POS Terminal records for the one location
dynamicChoiceSets.name: POSTerminalPicklistChoicesOneLocation

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Table that shows a list of all users where Till User = True.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TillUserTable

formulas.description: Concatenates the logged in user's first and last name.
formulas.name: CurrentUserFullNameTillUser

formulas.description: Calculates the default float amount based on what was entered into the custom setting.
formulas.name: DefaultFloatAmountFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $100 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf100BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $10 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf10BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $1 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf1BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $20 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf20BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $2 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf2BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $50 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf50BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the $5 bills based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOf5BillsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the dimes based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOfDimesFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the half dollars based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOfHalfDollarsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the nickels based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOfNickelsFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the pennies based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOfPenniesFormula

formulas.description: Sums the dollar value of the quarters based on the user's input.
formulas.name: SumOfQuartersFormula

formulas.description: Sets the naming convention of the Till Shift name.
formulas.name: TillShiftName

Flow.label: Till Management Start of Shift

recordCreates.description: Creates the shell Shift Deposit record.
recordCreates.name: Create_Shell_Shift_Deposit
recordCreates.label: Create Shell Shift Deposit

recordLookups.description: Gets Till Shifts related to the current user where Status = Open
recordLookups.name: Get_Open_Till_Shifts_related_to_Current_User
recordLookups.label: Get Open Till Shifts related to Current User

recordLookups.description: Get a list of users where Till User = true
recordLookups.name: Get_Till_Users
recordLookups.label: Get Till Users

recordRollbacks.description: Rolls back created records if the flow errors out.
recordRollbacks.name: Roll_Back_Records
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Records

screens.description: Screen where Front Desk user counts the float at the start of their till shift.
screens.name: Count_Start_of_Shift_Float
screens.label: Count Start of Shift Float

fields.name: CountStartofShiftFlowMessage
fields.fieldText:
Count your Cash


Count the amount of each type of coin and bill below to see the total amount of cash in your till.


In the next step you'll be able to compare that agains the amount you should expect to see.

fields.name: ExpectedFloatAmount
fields.fieldText: Expected: {!DefaultFloatAmountFormula}

fields.name: SumOfActualFloat
fields.fieldText: Total: {!ActualFloatFormula}

screens.description: The user will create their till shift record here.
screens.name: Details_About_Till
screens.label: Details About Till

fields.name: EnterTillShiftInfo
fields.fieldText:
Select your Location


Choose from one of the locations below, this sets up the till that you'll be selling out of.

screens.description: The user will create their till shift record here.
screens.name: Details_About_Till_One_Location
screens.label: Details About Till One Location

fields.name: Copy_1_of_EnterTillShiftInfo
fields.fieldText:
Select your POS Terminal


Choose from one of the POS terminals below, this sets up the till that you'll be selling out of.

screens.description: Asks the user if they want to close their open till shift.
screens.name: Does_User_Want_to_Close_Open_Till_Shifts
screens.label: Does User Want to Close Open Till Shifts

fields.name: Close_Existing_Till
fields.fieldText:
Close Open Till


Looks like you have an existing till that is already open, would you like to close this out before you open a new one?

fields.name: Would_You_Like_to_Close_Your_Open_Tills
fields.fieldText: Would You Like to Close Your Open Tills?

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
Oops! Looks like an error.


Reach out to your system administrator or Traction Rec support with this error message for help:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.description: Screen to finalize and submit the counted float amount.
screens.name: Finalize_and_Submit
screens.label: Finalize and Submit

fields.name: ReviewAndFinalizeHeader
fields.fieldText:
Review & Confirm


Review the amount that you counted in the last step and compare it to the amount that should be in the till.


You can go back if you need to recount or add any notes needed.

fields.name: ActualFloatAmount
fields.fieldText: Actual Amount: {!ActualFloatFormula}

screens.description: Screen that displays if the org has no till users.
screens.name: No_Till_Users_Error
screens.label: No Till Users Error

fields.name: NoTillUsersErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
Oops! Looks like an error.


Reach out to your system administrator or Traction Rec support with this error message for help:


Error: No user records with Till User = true were found. Please contact your admin to ensure your user record is created and that the Till User field = true.

screens.description: Allows user to choose their POS Terminal based on the location they chose.
screens.name: Select_POS_Terminal
screens.label: Select POS Terminal

fields.name: SelectPOSTerminalHeader
fields.fieldText:
Select your POS Terminal


Choose from one of the POS terminals below, this sets up the till that you'll be selling out of.

screens.description: Screen where Front Desk user chooses their Till User record.
screens.name: Select_Till_User
screens.label: Select Till User

fields.name: PleaseChooseTillUser
fields.fieldText:
Select your User


To get started, choose your user from below.

screens.description: The first screen that asks if a Front Desk user wants to open or close a till.
screens.name: Welcome_Screen
screens.label: Welcome Screen

fields.name: WelcomeMessage
fields.fieldText:
Welcome to Cash In and Out!


Use this process to easily cash in and cash out during your shift.


To get started, choose whether you will be opening a till (cashing in) or closing a till (cashing out).

subflows.description: Triggers the end of shift screen flow.
subflows.name: End_of_Shift
subflows.label: End of Shift

subflows.description: Opens end of shift flow to close open shift.
subflows.name: End_of_Shift_Close_Open_Till
subflows.label: End of Shift Close Open Till

variables.description: Stores the Id of the current user who accessed the flow.
variables.name: CurrentUser

variables.description: Till Shift record that is being opened.
variables.name: TillShift
